--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Richard Turner" <ikkanshi@w...> 
wrote:
> Hi all, ok these were my guesses, and they are just my guesses, 
interested to hear what others think. 
> A, Kanayama, very simular in style to the Mid Muromachi works. 

I would love it to be Kanayama :-) I think maybe Owari or Shoami.

> B, Nara, Old school so Ko-Nara ( still not sure about this though, 
that was my first thought 

That's what I think also, but the inlay (really more onlay)
is really 3-D. It's like the wire, leaves and beads are
on top of the plate. Don't know if Nara did that.

> C, Kanayama, or maybe Owari 

I think possibly either.

> D, Ito maybe.

I'm guessing either katchushi or Shoami.
 
> 
> That was my tsuba kantei for the day :-). 
> how did I score. 
> 
> Rich T

Thanks for the suggestions.

Rich S
